scripts.image:docker:build: kie-tools--image-builder build -r "$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.registry)" -a "$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.account)" -n "$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.name)" -t "$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.buildTag)" --build-arg PLAYWRIGHT_IMAGE_TAG="$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.playwrightImageTag)"
scripts.start:docker: docker container run --rm -q --name="$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.name)" -p "$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.port.chromium)":"$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.port.chromium)" -p "$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.port.chrome)":"$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.port.chrome)" -p "$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.port.webkit)":"$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.port.webkit)" --add-host="host.docker.internal:host-gateway" "$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.registry)$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.account)$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.name)$(build-env playwrightBrowsersServer.image.buildTag)"
